item.title: Newsletter
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Stay updated on all the news about the project! More than 5,000 people are registered to this newsletter! For more informations info@timeline-wp.com

Enter your email to be news about Timeline

[newsletter=1]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Have you written an article on Timeline WP? Tell us about it and we will add you to the list!
Timeline WP, un tema de WordPress inspirado en el nuevo Facebook techcrunch We just got this excellent tip from Julian describing the process by which he created this very own theme, the aptly-named Timeline-wp. He wants no beef with Facebook and, while I find the adoption of an established megacompanys brand and image slightly unbecoming and/or dangerous even for a private blog (and a bit shortsighted as Facebook will probably tear this design up by the time the next f8 rolls around), you can download and install the theme today at no cost to you. Timeline WP, un tema de WordPress inspirado en el nuevo Facebook wwwhatsnew On his motivation for creating the theme, he added, My mission is to understand how powerful WordPress is. Many think it is a content-management system only for blogs, but it is more. I actually thought about creating a paid version [of the theme], but I think it will be free only, to experiment and study the layout and the CMS. Use Facebooks New Timeline As A WordPress Theme? allfacebook Sea como sea el trabajo esttico es excelente, por lo que en timeline-wp.com han estado trabajando en un tema de WordPress que usa su estructura de informacin.
Como podemos ver, el aspecto es practicamente el mismo, con la clasificacin de fechas en la parte superior derecha y las grandes imgenes dando destaque al contenido.

item.title: News
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Timeline Wordpress Theme was ideated and designed by JuliusDesign ispired by Timeline Facebook based on Twenty Eleven 1.2 proudly powered by WordPress.
JuliusDesign is the blog of Giuliano Ambrosio, Italian web designer freelence, one of the most popular blogs in Italy on the web and design. I wanted to challenge myself to design the beautiful new layout of Facebook using the power of WordPress.
For more informations info@timeline-wp.com Enter your email to be news about Timeline [newsletter=1]

UNORDERED LIST

ORDERED LIST 123 ABC

  2. three, four
    1. knock at the door
  3. Five, six
    1. pick up sticks
  4. Seven, eight, lay them straight
    1. Nine, ten, a big fat hen
    2. Eleven, twelve, dig and delve
    3. Thirteen, fourteen, maids acourting
    4. Fifteen, sixteen, maids in the kitchen
    5. Seventeen, eighteen, maids awaiting
    6. Nineteen, twenty, my platters empty

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Timeline WordPress Theme was ideated and designed by JuliusDesign ispired by Timeline Facebook based on Twenty Eleven 1.2 proudly powered by WordPress. The purpose of this subject is to learn the power of WordPress for educational purposes. JuliusDesign is the blog of Giuliano Ambrosio, Italian web designer freelence, one of the most popular blogs in Italy on the web and design.
I wanted to challenge myself to design the beautiful new layout of Facebook using the power of WordPress.

Some important articles that have talked about us

Getcher Facebook Timeline WordPress Theme Here - techcrunch
We just got this excellent tip from Julian describing the process by which he created this very own theme, the aptly-named Timeline-wp. He wants no beef with Facebook and, while I find the adoption of an established megacompanys brand and image slightly unbecoming and/or dangerous even for a private blog (and a bit shortsighted as Facebook will probably tear this design up by the time the next f8 rolls around), you can download and install the theme today at no cost to you.
Use Facebooks New Timeline As A WordPress Theme? - allfacebook
On his motivation for creating the theme, he added, My mission is to understand how powerful WordPress is. Many think it is a content-management system only for blogs, but it is more. I actually thought about creating a paid version [of the theme], but I think it will be free only, to experiment and study the layout and the CMS.
Facebook Timeline Mania, 10 Utilizzi Creativi - ninjamarketing
La Facebook Timeline mania uscita addirittura fuori da Facebook! Infatti Giuliano Ambrosio aka Julius Design subito dopo la conferenza, ha realizzato Timeline WP, che finito addirittura sulle pagine di TechCrunch, il primo tema basato su CMS WordPress ispirato da Timeline.
Timeline WP, un tema de WordPress inspirado en el nuevo Facebook - wwwhatsnew
Sea como sea el trabajo esttico es excelente, por lo que en timeline-wp.com han estado trabajando en un tema de WordPress que usa su estructura de informacin.
Un magnifique thme WordPress inspir par Facebook - nowhereelse
Il naura pas fallu attendre bien longtemps pour quun petit malin sattle la cration dun thme WordPress inspir par la nouvelle Timeline Facebook que je vous ai prsent la semaine dernire et qui nest dailleurs pas encore disponible pour le grand public, cest dire la ractivit du garon

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Timeline Scrubber

We have integrated the theme of the ability to navigate through months in scrubber fixed style. If you are not on the home page, you will go in the archives

Featured Category

You have the opportunity to highlight in your header, four items in a category called Featured.

The Category

The visitor can browse through the latest post in each category page.

Photo Gallery

Photo gallery integrated with Nextgen Gallery Plugin and page templates.

Author Page

404Page

Customize Theme

The Customized Theme for Administrator User More Features coming soon

item.title: Release Archive
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Version Download Features & Fix
1.3 soon
  • added photo avatar in customize page
1.2 Download ZIP
  • added guide theme
  • added photo gallery
  • fix format status articles
  • fix wpquery menu scrubber
  • fix author link
  • fix fopen notify
1.1 Download ZIP
  • fix bug about logo image
  • fix bug about timeline scrubber
  • added photo header
  • added switch comment FB or native WP
  • added ID Fan Box in theme options
  • added ID Track Google Analytics in theme options
  • added info box about timeline news release
1.0 Download ZIP
